content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for considering my apartment. I would be happy to negotiate with you on the rental price. May I ask what your budget is for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm looking for a place that I can afford, so my budget is only 800 Euros per month. Is this possible for you?
name: Max Müller

content: I understand your budget, but I'm afraid that a 25-square-meter apartment in this location would require a higher monthly rent. I'm afraid that 800 Euros per month would not cover the expenses associated with maintaining and managing the apartment. However, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a rental price that works for both of us. What are your thoughts on a rental price of 1000 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can't afford that, I'm looking for something lower, can we find a compromise?

My budget is only 800 Euros per month. Can you find a way to make it work for both of us?

If you are unable to find a compromise, I will have to look elsewhere. Thank you for your time.

I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller

content: I understand that your budget is limited, and I apologize for any inconvenience that may have caused. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a compromise. However, I'm afraid that a rental price of 800 Euros per month would not be feasible for me. The expenses associated with managing the apartment would require a higher rental price in order to cover the costs. I apologize for any disappointment this may have caused, and I wish you the best of luck in finding a rental that fits your budget. Thank you for your understanding and for your time.
name: Heinrich Heine
